fields.heading: Hone your Jedi Skills
fields.caption: All members have access to our unique training and achievemnts ladders.  Show of your StarWars skills, progress through the levels and show everyone who the top Jedi Master is!

fields.heading: Build your Clan
fields.caption: Engage in meanigful conversation, or bloodthirsty battle! If it's related to StarWars you better belive we do it :)

fields.heading: Find Love
fields.caption: Everybody knows StarWars fans arethe best mates for StarWars fans.  Find your Princess Leia or Hans Solo and explore the starts together.
